name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Parental Control - Block Websites You Do not want your child to access!

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Block websites you do not want your child to access!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Parental Control Focus Mode is a productivity-enhancing Chrome extension designed to help users reduce distractions and stay focused. This extension allows users to block access to specific websites, such as social media or news sites, during designated focus times. Users can easily set up a list of websites they find distracting and schedule focus periods when these sites will be inaccessible. Whether you're working, studying, or simply need a break from online distractions, Parental Control Focus Mode helps create a more focused and efficient environment.

Features:
DEFAULT PASSWORD IS: 1234
Block access to specified websites during scheduled focus times.
Easily customizable list of distracting websites.
Intuitive user interface for easy setup and management.
Helps improve productivity and concentration.

Disclaimer:
This extension is created for fun and is intended as a tool to assist users in managing their online habits. The developer assumes no responsibility for any consequences resulting from the use of this extension, including but not limited to loss of data, productivity, or access to websites. Users are encouraged to use this extension responsibly and at their own risk. By using this extension, you acknowledge that the developer is not liable for any direct or indirect damages or issues that may arise from its use.
